QuestData.Title: Thorny Dancing
QuestData.Description: The Thistleleaf sprites have gone completely mad.$b$bI suspect they are being manipulated by some very mischievous Thorndancers.$b$bPlease, friend of the forest, seek out these seductive troublemakers and bring peace to the shallows.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat $1oa Thistleleaf Thorndancers in the Lunarwing Shallows.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you dealt with those Thorndancers yet?
QuestData.RewardText: That should set those vexing Thorndancers on their way.
